Reviews.Content: Dissapointing Great place to stay and i have stayed here before! The rooms are decent and usually no problems. on my most recent stay however my camera was stolen from my bag by one of the staff members when i left my gear out the back of reception while wasting time untill it was time to go to the airport. Only relised it was missing a week later back in Australia. Confronted the hotel the hotel the other week when i was back and they shrugged it off :-( thank god for travel insurance
Reviews.Author: ColesyOZ
